english.segment1: I feel like I can't stand still anymore. Are you with me?. You got a mic here's the band now get your feet off the floor
english.segment2: I cannot run away. The feeling's gotta stay while we rock all night long (hey, hey, hey hey). I think that we all know. The reason that we show the world how real we are (hey, hey, hey hey)
english.segment3: Turn it up feel the beat and scream the lyrics you know. Keep it coming. The time is right lets unite to the rock and roll. Everybody
english.segment4: I cannot run away. The feeling's gotta stay while we rock all night long(hey, hey, hey hey). I think that we all know. The reason that we show the world how real we are (hey, hey, hey hey)
english.segment5: There's a greater meaning. Beyond the music the music that we are bringing. Cuz tonight we are singing. And together we know
english.segment6: We cannot run away. The feeling's gotta stay while we rock all night long (hey, hey, hey hey). I think that we all know. The reason that we show the world how real we are (hey, hey, hey hey). Hey. Yea!
